se.jguru.nazgul.test.persistence

Class AbstractDbUnitAndJpaTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.test.persistence.AbstractJpaTest
      • se.jguru.nazgul.test.persistence.AbstractDbUnitAndJpaTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardPersistenceTest

    public abstract class AbstractDbUnitAndJpaTest
extends AbstractJpaTest
    Abstract superclass for JPA based tests, that uses dbUnit to define criteria to setup and evaluate database state
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

      • isSeparateConnectionsUsedForDbUnitAndJPA

        protected boolean isSeparateConnectionsUsedForDbUnitAndJPA()
        Retrieves true if dbUnit and JPA should use separate Connections to the test database, and false otherwise. Defaults to false, but can be overridden in subclasses to use other behaviour.
        Returns:
        true if dbUnit and JPA should use separate Connections to the test database, and false otherwise.

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws Exception
        Setting up the DbUnit framework which setup the inherited Persistence Entity Manager. DbUnit will use the already initiated SQL connection from the Persistence Entity Manager.
        Overrides:
        setUp in class AbstractJpaTest
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurred.

      • getDatabaseConnection

        protected final org.dbunit.database.IDatabaseConnection getDatabaseConnection(boolean newConnection)
                                                                       throws Exception
        Acquires the dbUnit IDatabaseConnection, and overwrites the local/protected iDatabaseConnection member with the result.
        Parameters:
        newConnection - if true, the IDatabaseConnection will be re-acquired from the underlying JDBC Connection even if it exists.
        Returns:
        The newly acquired IDatabaseConnection.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the underlying dbUnit DatabaseConnection could not be created.

      • getTargetDirectory

        protected File getTargetDirectory()
        Retrieves a File to the target directory.
        Returns:
        the project target directory path, wrapped in a File object.

      • getDataSet

        protected org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet getDataSet(@NotNull @Size(min=1)
                                                 String filename)
                                          throws org.dbunit.dataset.DataSetException
        Load a DataSet from XML file.
        Parameters:
        filename - data file xml.
        Returns:
        an IDataSet instance of the entities loaded from xml.
        Throws:
        org.dbunit.dataset.DataSetException - if an error occurred while reading XML definition.

      • extractFlatXmlDataSet

        protected final String extractFlatXmlDataSet(@NotNull
                                             org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet dataSet)
        Converts the supplied dataSet to a FlatXmlDataSet which, in turn, is written to a String.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The string representation of the supplied IDataSet.

      • dropAllDbObjectsInPublicSchema

        protected final void dropAllDbObjectsInPublicSchema(boolean shutdownDatabase)
        Drops all the Database Objects in the public schema of the active database.
        Parameters:
        shutdownDatabase - if true, the database should be shutdown after cleaning the schema.
